Table 2. Comparison with other state-of-the-art methods on 
the validation set of Kinetics-400. Note that R50 and R101 denote 
the backbone networks and their depth respectively.

Table 4. Results on the validation set of Something-Something 
V1 & V2. Note that results on V1 & V2 take the center crop of 1 
clip/video according to [18].

Table 5. Results on the validation set of Epic-Kitchen. TSN is
